name: Apocryphal
description:
Apocryphal is a puzzle game where the goal is to move from

room to room while trying to find out what happened to Kazan and escape.

This game is a demo created by 4 student of Montpellier in France 

Kazan wakes up in an unknown place with a disturbing atmosphere,

he doesn't feel alone and he tries to understand who or what's observing him,

so he is thinking about how he is going to leave this place.

      Kilian Di Fraja : Programer 

  Arthurn : Sound Design / Composer

  Gabriel Gas : Level Design 

  Samuel Guibert : Game Design / Producer   

We hope you will enjoy this game.
